title: Accountant & Cost Controller

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Secure appointments/meetings through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new prospects 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new sales 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to upsell and cross-sell existing customers 
 
• Keep close track of leads and conduct follow ups with customers for closure of sales 
 
• Report to the Sales & Business Development Manager 
 
 
 
Job Description 
 
• Ability to speak in Chinese 
 
• Deliver prepared sales talks, reading from scripts that describe products or services, or improvise, in order to persuade potential customers to take a desired action eg. agree to an appointment for presentation or purchase a product or service. 
 
• Schedule appointments for sales representatives to meet prospective customers or for customers to attend sales presentations or workshops. 
 
• Explain products or services and prices, and answer questions from potential customers. 
 
• Obtain potential customer information such as name, address, email, and contact numbers. 
 
• Obtain names and telephone numbers of potential customers from sources such as internet directories, telephone directories, trade directories, and lists purchased from other organizations. 
 
• Telephone or write email letters to correspondence with potential customers or to follow up initial sales contacts. 
 
• Documenting and recording information like entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information of customers. 
 
• Maintain records of contacts, accounts, and new opportunities/leads created. 
 
• Conduct client or market surveys in order to obtain information about potential customers. 
 
• Contact existing customers to promote cross-sell or up-sell of companies' products and services. 
 
• Maintains phone time or sales quotas as determined by management 
 
 
SMS interest to Keagan @ 93526073, Preferably Locals and ability to converse in Chinese
title: Administrator / Personal Assistant

title: How i got my financial rescue
